Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes the crimes of making a threat of mass harm and aggravated threat of mass harm
Summary: Establishes the crimes of making a threat of mass harm and aggravated threat of mass harm.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crimes of making a threat of mass harm and aggravated threat of mass harm
